headline: Parents Wanted School Choice  and They Voted
author: Corey DeAngelis
sentences: Last year, Glenn Youngkin won Virginias gubernatorial election by riding a wave of parental discontent over district schools that were failing to open for in-person instruction, be transparent about radical curricular materials, or even keep kids safe.
Youngkin promised to make schools more accountable to parents and to enact policies that give parents more choices among schooling options.
Governor Youngkins victory owed much to the playbook used by Ron DeSantis in the 2018 race for governor of Florida.
School choice emerged as a litmus-test issue for Republican primary voters.
DeSantis made school choice a centerpiece of his campaign, and ...
Republican politicians are calling themselves the Parents Party.
Parents are holding them to it.
